content.prompt: The artist withdrew the series from public auction because he

choices.label: was concerned about being tried by the Inquisition
feared he might offend members of the royal family
doubted the artistic quality of the work

topic.text: 4.2: Purpose and Audience in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
